metadata.title: CVE-2022-22590 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 15.3 and iPadOS 15.3, watchOS 8.4, tvOS 15.3, Safari15.3, macOS Monterey 12.2. Processing maliciously crafted web content maylead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
